name: jewgo-app
description: JewGo - Kosher restaurant finder and marketplace

scripts.mcp:build: pnpm -C tools/ts-next-strict-mcp build && pnpm -C tools/ci-guard-mcp build
scripts.mcp:install: pnpm -C tools/ts-next-strict-mcp install --no-frozen-lockfile && pnpm -C tools/ci-guard-mcp install --no-frozen-lockfile && pipx install -e tools/schema-drift-mcp
scripts.mcp:update: pnpm -C tools/ts-next-strict-mcp update --no-frozen-lockfile && pnpm -C tools/ci-guard-mcp update --no-frozen-lockfile && pipx upgrade schema-drift-mcp
